mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager_history (prefer_area, mgr_content, mgr_date, mgr_state, user_code) VALUES (#{preferArea}, #{mgrContent}, now(), 'TO', #{userCode})
mapper.select: SELECT mgr_code, prefer_area, mgr_content, mgr_date, CASE mgr_state WHEN 'TO' THEN '신청완료' WHEN 'RE' THEN '검토중' WHEN 'PASS' THEN '합격' WHEN 'FAIL' THEN '불합격' END mgr_state, m.user_code, u.user_name FROM manager_history AS m INNER JOIN user_info AS u ON m.user_code = u.user_code WHERE mgr_state = 'TO'

SELECT mgr_code, prefer_area, mgr_content, mgr_date, CASE mgr_state WHEN 'TO' THEN '신청완료' WHEN 'RE' THEN '검토중' WHEN 'PASS' THEN '합격' WHEN 'FAIL' THEN '불합격' END mgr_state, m.user_code, u.user_name FROM manager_history AS m INNER JOIN user_info AS u ON m.user_code = u.user_code WHERE mgr_state = 'FAIL'
mapper.update: UPDATE manager_history AS m INNER JOIN user_info AS u ON m.user_code = u.user_code SET m.mgr_state = 'PASS', u.user_authority = '매니저' WHERE mgr_code = #{mgrCode}
UPDATE manager_history AS m INNER JOIN user_info AS u ON m.user_code = u.user_code SET m.mgr_state = 'FAIL', u.user_authority = '일반회원' WHERE mgr_code = #{mgrCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_info AS u INNER JOIN manager_history m ON u.user_code = m.user_code WHERE u.user_authority = '매니저'
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET user_authority = '매니저' WHERE user_code = #{userCode} AND user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE user_info SET user_authority = '일반회원' WHERE user_code = #{userCode}
UPDATE manager_history SET mgr_state = 'FAIL' WHERE mgr_code = (SELECT mgr_code FROM manager_history WHERE user_code = #{user_code})
